display_name: Functional Outcomes of Sleep: Social Outcome Score (1-4)
description:
Subscore based on 2 items from Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire. A lower score suggests greater difficulty in social outcomes.[Weaver et. al, 1997 (Pubmed ID: 9415942)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9415942)

[Search for all Functional Outcomes of Sleep variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mros/variables?search=fosq)
